channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP Cloud Connector
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP Cloud Connector

item.title: CVE-2023-49578|2024-08-02T22:01:25.933Z -- sap_se -- sap%20cloud%20connector
item.description: SAP Cloud Connector - version 2.0, allows an authenticated user with low privilege to perform Denial of service attack from adjacent UI by sending a malicious request which leads to low impact on the availability and no impact on confidentiality or IntegrityÂ of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-25642|2024-02-13T02:44:20.284Z -- sap_se -- sap%20cloud%20connector
item.description: Due to improper validation of certificate in SAP Cloud Connector - version 2.0, attacker can impersonate the genuine servers to interact with SCC breaking the mutual authentication. Hence, the attacker can intercept the request to view/modify sensitive information. There is no impact on the availability of the system.
